Dialog.Title: Fugitive
Dialog.Content: Huff... Huff... Huff...

Dialog.Title: Servant
Dialog.Content: Not so fast, kid. You're not the first to try making a run for it.

Dialog.Title: Fugitive
Dialog.Content: You-! You killed them!!

Dialog.Title: Servant
Dialog.Content: Sorry about that. Just doing my job, you know?

Dialog.Title: Fugitive
Dialog.Content: Gh-! Haah..!

Dialog.Title: Fugitive
Dialog.Content: S-Stay back!

Dialog.Title: Servant
Dialog.Content: Hm? What's that sword of yours doing...?

Dialog.Title: Fugitive
Dialog.Content: Come on... Come on...

Dialog.Title: Servant
Dialog.Content: Oh no you don't!

Dialog.Title: Servant
Dialog.Content: Whew... managed to actually stop one of them from running for once. Was worried we'd have another Philip on our hands.

Dialog.Title: Servant
Dialog.Content: Good thing I managed to stop him before he finished doing whatever it was he was trying to do with that weird sword of his yeah?

Dialog.Title: Library Director
Dialog.Content: Hm.

Dialog.Title: Servant
Dialog.Content: I... did stop him, right?

Dialog.Title: Library Director
Dialog.Content: It would seem the entire world outside the Library has been rewound by several minutes.

Dialog.Title: Servant
Dialog.Content: ...You're shitting me.

Dialog.Title: Library Director
Dialog.Content: No, I am not "shitting" you, Roland.

Dialog.Title: Servant
Dialog.Content: sigh... So, what? Did it rewind before they came here? Are they about to show up again? I swear if we're stuck in some kind of time loop now...

Dialog.Title: Library Directory
Dialog.Content: I... am not certain. We will have to wait and see what happens. In the meantime, I'm going to take a look in their books.

Dialog.Title: Servant
Dialog.Content: Seeya, Angela.

Dialog.Title: Servant
Dialog.Content: ...So that sword has the ability to turn back time, huh? I wonder...
